p: ZGO reports consultation fees from Lysosomal Therapeutics Inc. (LTI), Idorsia, Denali, Prevail Therapeutics, Inception Sciences (Ventus), all outside the submitted work. AD received research grants from Flamel Ireland Limited, Pfizer, Canopy Growth, Biron as well as honoraria from speaking engagements from UCB and Biogen. None of the financial disclosures is relevant to the submitted work. RBP reports personal fees from Takeda, Roche/Prothena, Teva Neurosciences, Novartis Canada, Biogen, Boehringer Ingelheim, Theranexus, GE HealthCare, Jazz Pharmaceuticals, Abbvie, Jannsen, and Otsuko, all outside the submitted work.
